row.entry: Maximum rafter/truss top chord length without sarking (mm) Note 1

ol.li: The maximum rafter/truss top chord length is measured from the topmost point of the rafter/truss i.e. the apex downwards. Where the maximum length is exceeded, sarking must be installed over the remainder of the rafter/truss top chord length towards the eave line of the roof, or equivalent where the building has no eaves.
All tiled roofs with a pitch less than 18 degrees must be provided with sarking, regardless of rafter/truss chord length.
